actions.description: The ettin makes two attacks: one with its battleaxe and one with its morningstar.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Battleaxe

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

traits.description: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.
traits.name: Two Heads

traits.description: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.
traits.name: Wakeful
